share on x ld luke darling. jun 11 at 8:41 pm so sorry to hear of your loss. we express our sympathy to everyone in the family and pray for god's peace during this difficult time. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 11 at 1:17 pm quiet expressions was purchased for the family of harvey j. buter. share on x jun 11 at 8:39 am blooming garden basket was purchased for the family of harvey j. buter. share on x jd joyce dykhouse. jun 11 at 8:10 am our deepest sorrow goes out to all of you. we loved harv and had a deep respect for him. it was awesome seeing the love that was shared in your family. may god grant you peace at this sad time. joyce and bruce dykhouse. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x th ted & dar hewitt. jun 11 at 6:50 am we express our deep sympathy to the whole buter family as well as harv's new family. he will be missed but we are greatful for the memories we have of him. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x rf randy fisherjun 10 at 9:27 pm uncle harv you will truly be missed by all of us in your family, we all know you were very passionate about anything you believed in and tended to get riled up a bit :) but watching you with aunt carolyn over the last years of her life really showed me what true love is, i'm glad the two of you are reunited in heaven but you will be missed here on earth by so many. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm mason county reformed church45 south amber. scottville, mi, us, 49454. get order flowers now for harvey's visitation celebration of life service. jun 15. 11:00 am mason county reformed church45 south amber. scottville, mi, us, 49454. get order flowers now for harvey's celebration of life service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook wyman funeral & cremation services website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
